reason: Basic heuristic: fire + water = steam (opposites create transformation)
Heuristic rule: air feeds fire, creates energy
Common sense: earth + water = mud (wet soil)
Practical rule: heat transforms earth into lava
Simple heuristic: moving air erodes earth into dust
Practical shortcut: air + water creates mist or rain
Rule of thumb: hot lava meets water = stone/rock
Heuristic: cooling lava by air makes stone
Mental shortcut: steam rises in air to form clouds
Quick rule: mist + air movement = cloud
Practical rule: baking mud with fire hardens it into brick
Simple heuristic: combining stones makes bigger rock or wall
Rule of thumb: more fire with smoke creates ash
Common sense: burning dust creates ash
Practical shortcut: more earth makes land or mountain
Mental shortcut: more water makes sea or lake
Heuristic rule: adding water to puddle makes pond
Scaling rule: pond + more water = lake
Simple rule: more land creates continent
Heat accumulation rule: more fire = energy
Wind formation heuristic: air + air = wind
Physics shortcut: energy + air creates motion/wind
Crafting heuristic: heating stone makes metal
Geological rule: pressure transforms earth into coal/diamond
Temperature rule: heat + water = steam (retry basic)
Erosion rule: water wears stone into sand
Melting rule: heat sand to make glass
Melting shortcut: heat stone = metal/molten rock
Weather rule: sun evaporates water into cloud
Growth heuristic: sun + earth = day/warmth for plants
Weather rule: water + air = rain (retry for rain)
Settling rule: water + dust = mud (alternative path)
Life spark rule: energy + mud = life/swamp
Temperature rule: heat + heat = extreme heat/fire
Melting rule: glass + fire = molten glass/lens
Chemical rule: salt + fire = sodium/flame color
Solar rule: sun + glass = lens/magnifying glass
Weather rule: wind + dust = dust storm/tornado
Landscape rule: dune + dune = desert/sand hills
Shock wave rule: air + explosion = sonic boom
Cosmic rule: planet + planet = solar system
Universal rule: solar system + solar system = galaxy
Stellar rule: sun + sun = binary star/supernova
Orbital rule: planet + sun = solar system (alternative)
Marine life rule: sea + energy = fish/whale
Building rule: wall + brick = stronger wall/building
Life genesis: water + earth = life/plant (fundamental combo)
Stellar collapse: supernova + pressure = black hole
Ultimate scale: galaxy cluster + galaxy cluster = universe
Heat amplification: desert + sun = extreme heat/mirage
Solar heating: dune + sun = hot sand/mirage
Drying rule: mud + sun = clay/dry earth
Engine rule: steam + pressure = steam engine/power
Geothermal rule: geyser + energy = geothermal power
Industrial rule: steam + energy = steam engine/power
Water spout rule: tornado + water = hurricane/waterspout
Habitat rule: aquarium + water = filled aquarium/fish tank
Scale rule: aquarium + ocean = sea life/marine life
Geological rule: geyser + earth = hot spring/thermal vent
Cosmic rule: universe + energy = big bang/creation
Origin rule: universe + explosion = big bang
